Peripheral Modules

Peripheral modules which are currently build in or in development state

PeripheryWorking state
Status LEDworking
Relay Moduleworking
on any free GPIO Pin and optional HW Switch support
Analog Sensor on Pin A0working
Reference Voltage of 3v3
HC-SR501 Motion Sensorworking
on any free GPIO Pin
MAX7219 LED Matrix
working
currently only with Hardware SPI Support
Pins for HW SPI are IO13 (MOSI) and IO14 (CLK) the CS Pin is free assignable
RCSwitch for 868/433MHz Remote Plugsworking
on any GPIO Pin but configuration Webinterface still missing, configuration of plugs currently in config file only
HD44780 LCD Display over I2Cnot fully implemented
WS281x LED Stripnot fully implemented
HC-SR04 Ultrasonic Sensoron the roadmap
More to come ...
